entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
